TopicTitle: Anti Aliasing doesn't seem to be working as intended

Articles.Content:
This could be posted in Unmodded, but I only noticed it with Habtech 2 installed.  Back in 1.8.1, everything was fine.  Then I installed a 1.9.1 install and took a look, and the anti aliasing didn't seem to work on some parts.  I decided to load some parts into 1.10 to see if the problem was still there, and it is.

Here's 1.8.1 with all settings the same:

 

And here's 1.10 all settings the same:

 

The lines on the inside are very jagged in the 1.10 screenshot.    Could this be because Benjee doesn't use .dds textures?
